item.description:
Get ready for Connecticut’s largest St. Patrick’s themed road race!
Race will be capped at 2,500 participants!

Run our event or walk for fun in costume.  Prizes for the best individual and group costumes. The race features B-tag timing, tech shirts, on course entertainment, live music and post race party hosted by 99.1PLR and Toad’s Place.

Tech T-shirts Given to the first 1,500 race entrants.  Cotton shirts will be given to all other entrants.

Awards Top three race finishers in each age group.  Age Groups are Men & Women, 12 & under, 13-19, 20-24, 25-29,30-34, 35-39, 40-44, 45-49, 50-54, 55-59, 60-64, 65-69, 70-74, 75-79, 80+ and Wheelchair.

 Awards also given in the following special categories*:

Best Individual Costume – St. Patty’s Division
Best Individual Costume – Diaper Division
Best Group Costume – St. Patty’s Division
Best Group Costume – Diaper Division
Shortest Finisher
Tallest Finisher
Slowest Finisher
Weirdest Finisher

*Must be present as Awards Ceremony to win.

Registration: http://www.active.com/running/new-haven-ct/15th-annual-wplr-shamrock-and-roll-2012

Yale-New Haven Hospital Diaper Challenge- We encourage all runners to bring a package of diapers to the race to donate to The Diaper Bank. Yale-New Haven Hospital will match (up to 15,000) the diapers donated by race participants.  The Diaper Bank seeks to provide diapers to as many needy children as possible. They are a local, volunteer driven non-profit organization dedicated to helping young children and their families in New Haven, Bridgeport and Hartford.  For every package of diapers you bring, you will be given a raffle ticket, good for a chance to win a special prize, courtesy of WPLR.

Fundraise  Raise $100 or more for The Diaper Bank for a free entry into this year’s race.
item.name: WPLR ShamRock & Roll 5K Run
